column4: Hi there - I just wanted to check something quickly. Is Firefox 2 still in the Hardy repository? I want to upgrade, but a few sites don't run Java properly with 3.0. I will report this to the Moz team and the sites but in the meantime I need to know I won't be stuck!
That's great - thanks to all of you I will now upgrade - bye
I don't see any reason to run 64bit on your system. Do you have one?
